name: Abdominals
description: Core muscles including rectus abdominis, transverse abdominis, and obliques

name: Abductors
description: Hip abductor muscles that move the leg away from the body

name: Adductors
description: Inner thigh muscles that move the leg toward the body

name: Biceps
description: Front upper arm muscles responsible for elbow flexion

name: Calves
description: Lower leg muscles including gastrocnemius and soleus

name: Chest
description: Pectoral muscles of the upper chest

name: Forearms
description: Lower arm muscles used for grip and wrist movement

name: Hamstrings
description: Back thigh muscles responsible for knee flexion and hip extension

name: Lats
description: Latissimus dorsi, the broad back muscles

name: Lower Back
description: Erector spinae and lower back muscles

name: Quadriceps
description: Front thigh muscles responsible for knee extension

name: Triceps
description: Back upper arm muscles responsible for elbow extension

name: Traps
description: Trapezius muscles of the upper back and neck
